p: The EO of the (AJ) plant showed dose-dependent inhibitory activity against porcine pancreatic lipase, α-amylase, and α-glucosidase, compared with the positive controls, which were the anti-obesity drug orlistat and the antidiabetic medication acarbose. The results arising from the lipase, α-amylase, and α-glucosidase inhibitory activities evaluations of the (AJ) EO are shown in Figure 3, Figure 4 and Figure 5, while the IC 50 values are given in Table 2.
